content: käänteinen - reversible rib cap this rib cap was inspired by rocky movies the main character has a black cap on when running i too needed to knit a cap thin but warming and suitable for sensitive skin this cap has a wide folding edge which you can set as you like the simple crown decreases form a cross on one side right and wrong side are different and both can be used as the outside this cap is reversible and foldable just the way you like to size one size fits from child to adult diameter unstretched about 40 cm stretches to well over 70cm yarn sandnes lanett 100 % merino 50 g / 195 m 100 g in graphite gray for finer cap la alpaca 100% alpaca 50 g nm 3/8 100 g in orange for thicker cap needles 2 mm for finer cap 2 5 mm for thicker cap gauge 31 sts and 42 row to 10 cm square in stockinette stitch for finer cap 26 sts and 35 row to 10 cm square in slightly stretched k 3 p 2 rib for thicker cap samples are knit in magic loop with one 80 cm long circular needle there are instructions for two yarn qualities a finer and a thicker one first figure is for finer yarn and latter is for thicker yarn if there s only one figure in the instructions it applies for both sizes it s important that you knit decreases in same way and at same places all the time for the decrease pattern to form correctly the center stitch of decreasing stays at the same column of stitches all the time you can use st markers to help the ribbing in the cap knit in finer yarn will not go even at the end of round there will be a column of four consecutive knit sts at the changing of round spot if you are particular about your ribbing and still want to follow the pattern please knit in the size for thicker yarn as the ribbing goes even in it cast on 172 - 160 sts knit in round in k 3 p 2 rib for 22 cm start decreasing *k 40 - 37 make centered double decrease sl 2 knitwise together k 1 pass slipped sts over repeat from * three more times for a round next row continue in pattern knit sts at decreases as they come knit the knit sts and purl the purled ones decrease every other row until there s 16 about 16 sts between two decrease points then decrease on every row till you have 4 4 to 8 sts left keep the decreases at the same place as shown on the chart below this way they don t start swirling ▲ ▲ ▲ exemplary chart on decreasing in reversile rib cap ▲= centered double decrease white square = st in pattern grey square has no meaning k 1 pass all sts over pull the
